title: A question for James of Terminal Design
content:
Hi James,   
   
Is there anywhere online (your site, retailers, etc.) where one can set a specific copy sample with your typefaces (ala, Veer's "flont" or MyFonts' 'test driver' etc.)?   
   
 -t
author: timfm

comments.content: At the moment, no. Contact me directly and I'll try to help you out.
